column2: Note from Erin Ross, Executive Director: I run Camp SkyWild, an overnight camp for kids with autism and neurotypical siblings. We are a partnership group so run just one week at summer at this time. We’ll be hosted this year by North Star Reach in Pinckney, MI. We are also excited to offer two family camps (April and June) for families of neurodivergent children and adults, and an autistic adult overnight camp program during spring break in March.
